name: unStable [Geta GameJam12]
description:
A tornado blew away your whole stable! Now your horses are scared and could get lost! Can you stabilize your stable again?  ( s t a b l e ).

This is my submission for Geta GameJam 12! As you could guess by this game's description, the theme is "Unstable". And I did the hardmode challenge! (which was "Two Colours").

Made in 72 hours (actually 44, saw the theme kinda late).

Every asset was made by me (though I based small bits of code off simple tutorials).

Also someone please tell me what genre this game is, because to be honest I'm not really sure.

Feedback would be very appreaciated!

If you would want to play more levels of this game, then tell me in the comments! I would be glad to turn this into a full game!
